A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining\, however perhaps for the wrong reasons as the movie unexpectedly has an over-saturation of comic relief which in turn hurts the film from being taken seriously at times. Good to see more risk taken to adding something new to the franchise however i felt more time focused on delivering compelling drama rather than squeezing in a extra couple gags would have propelled this film to one the best of all time.
